title: A Cat Named Mouse
description: A prequel to the adult series, Mouse. What would the world be like from a cat's perspective? Would a cat ponder the meaning of life and death?Experience the world through the eyes of a cat named Mouse as he searches for the meaning of his existence. He recounts his memories of how he arrived in the old farmhouse and the intense emotions that surrounded him as a young kitten while he makes and loses friends.Check out the other books in the Mouse Series:Vol. 1 - Mouse: Pig HuntVol. 2 - Mouse: Bad DougVol. 3 - Mouse: New ToyVol. 4 - Mouse: NeuteredVol. 5 - Mouse: Field TripVol. 6 - Mouse: The Birthday WishVol. 7 - Mouse: Nine LivesMouse: Collected Works Volumes 1 to 5. This short story is ~2300 words and, as with all stories by Nick James, has no DRM.
author: Nick   James
